answers.answer: Hi,The information from the medical literature is largely on men who have problems with nerves such as those with diabetes and spinal cord disorders, in which the retrograde ejaculation is deemed a complication, not a volitional activity.

question: Hello, I've taken an interest in tantric sex and found out that I could achive a dry orgasm by contracting my muscles in my pubic area. Is it safe, I understand that the seamen gets forced to the bladder but I don't want to damage my prostate. Again there is no outside stimulus just pure muscle contraction.
title: Are intentional dry orgasms harmful?
